attributes.action: Stop Velo coming to Birmingham and surrounding areas
attributes.additional_details: Many residents were not notified and didn't find out what was actually happening until the week before. At 9pm on the night people were still gridlocked. Families were distressed at not being able to visit ill relatives. This event was totally mismanaged and should not have taken place. We need to stop this from happening again. Businesses were badly affected too. It may have been for charity but the attitude of those taking part was selfish.
attributes.background: On Sunday 24th September 2017 Velo was hosted in Birmingham and surrounding areas. It resulted in chaos for road users.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Decisions about local road closures are the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
